attributes.action: Start a road pricing scheme that covers all congested roads in the UK now
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The traffic on our roads continues to increase.

The pollution from the vehicles on the roads continues to worsen.

A lot of journeys that are made using cars are either unnecessary, or could easily have been done on foot, bicycle or public transport. 

Motorists need to be discouraged from using their cars, except when a car journey is absolutely essential.

The only thing that will reduce traffic on our roads is charging for the use of these congested roads.

The Congestion Charge implemented in Central London has been a great success.
A similar scheme needs to be set up to conver all the congested roads in the UK, including motorways, city centres, suburban areas and all other areas where there is heavy road usage.

This should be brought in as soon as possible; so that when we really need to go somewhere in our cars, we can actually get there.
